Class ShardCacheWrapper

java.lang.Object
  com.jeffrick.hibernate.cache.ShardCacheWrapper
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.hibernate.cache.Cache
public class ShardCacheWrapper
extends Object
implements org.hibernate.cache.Cache

This wrapper provides a prefix for the cache based on the current shard db

Author:
Jeff Rick Date: Feb 14, 2010 Time: 11:30:28 AM
